title: Review on polyaniline-based nanocomposite heterogeneous catalysts for catalytic reduction of hazardous water pollutants
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26801-26819
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02550D, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Parmeshwar Lal Meena, Ajay Kumar Surela
Water contamination by highly toxic substances has generated serious ecological disturbances and health problems for humans. Catalytic reductive removal of water contaminants using PANI based heterogeneous catalysts is an effective technique.
